DataElement.preferredDefinition: An individual healthcare provider that is a part of a care team.:Characteristics of people that are socially constructed, including norms, behaviors, and roles based on sex. As a social construct, gender varies from society to society and can change over time. (Adapted from WHO.)_The person or authoritative body who provided the information._The information contained in a data field.
